questions.text: Before we dive in, what's your company name?
Got it! In a sentence or two, what do you do?
What industry are you in?
Who's your primary customer? A quick description works perfectly.
What's your main goal for the next 6–12 months? Growth, rebrand, new market, something else?
Do you have a website?
What's the URL? I'd love to take a look.
No worries! Are you planning to launch one soon, or focusing on other channels for now?
Do you have any social profiles where people can learn about your brand?
Which platforms are you active on? You can select multiple: Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, YouTube, X (Twitter), Bluesky, or others?
Perfect! Share the links to any profiles you'd like me to look at.
What makes you different from others in your space? What's your unique angle?
Who do you see as your main competitors? (This helps me understand your positioning better.)
How do you want people to feel when they interact with your brand? Trusted? Excited? Inspired?
What problem do you solve, and who do you solve it for?
Do you have a clear elevator pitch—something you can say in 30 seconds that makes people immediately understand what you do?
How would you describe your brand's tone of voice? Professional? Friendly? Playful? Authoritative?
Does your messaging feel consistent across your website, social, emails, and other touchpoints?
When someone first discovers your brand, do they immediately 'get' what you do, or does it take some explaining?
Tell me a little about how your logo came to be. Did you design it, hire someone, use a template?
Do you use consistent brand colors across your materials, or does it vary?
How would you describe the overall feel of your visuals? Modern, classic, premium, playful, minimalist?
Which marketing channels are you actively using today? You can select multiple.
What kind of content do you publish? Blog posts, social updates, videos, newsletters?
Do you have a content system or schedule, or is it more sporadic?
Do you have an email list?
How often do you send email campaigns? Weekly, monthly, or just when you have something to share?
Do you have testimonials, case studies, press mentions, or awards that showcase your credibility?
Can visitors quickly see examples of your work or results on your website?
Does your website have clear calls-to-action—like 'Get Started,' 'Book a Call,' or 'Download'?
When someone visits your site, is it obvious what the next step is?
Do you have lead magnets, forms, or nurture sequences to capture and follow up with visitors?
Perfect! Ready to see your WunderBrand Score™?

Perfect! I've completed your WunderBrand Snapshot™ analysis. Your scores are ready below — enter your details to receive your complete WunderBrand Snapshot™ report with detailed insights and recommendations.
